text: Hareuta gata hana phaedah Kon roe areuta ngon aneuk gata Nyang peutoe gata keudeh bak Allah t Nyang toe ngon Kamoe soe nyang meuiman 8 Laen nibaknyan amai jroh leupah Ureueng nyan teuma balah meuganda Sabab usaha masa nyang sudah Aman ureueng nyan sideh meuteuntee Lam juree-juree churuga indah
